nodes.text: The Politics of Contraband is a roleplaying game adventure written by Paul Arden Lidberg that appears in The Politics of Contraband, published by West End Games in September 1992.
The story is set in the New Republic era, but before the Thrawn campaign: between 5 ABY and 9 ABY.

Sometimes after the Battle of Endor, Garvan Spasso hired a group of smugglers to carry some spices and holotapes to Borke Valkanhayn on Glova. But once arrived on the planet, their ship was confiscated by Inspector Smitken of the planetary militia who was working for Governor Tegist Byrg.
